struct.description: Advanced properties for configuring the file reader.

simple.name: maxOutputRate
simple.description: The maximum rate at which to push samples. This can differ from the sample rate at which the file was taken to slow down streams which have a sample rate greater than the maximum output rate.

simple.name: packetSize
simple.description: The number of bytes in each packet used to cache the file data. The default is about 90% of the default CORBA maximum transfer size.

simple.name: queueSize
simple.description: The number of packets to initalize the free data queue with. These are then populated with the data from the files to provide caching of the file data.
